author: Peerzada Ashiq
text:
The Congress and the National Conference (NC) on Tuesday asked Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) chief Mehbooba Mufti “to apprise people of the reasons for the delay in government formation.”

Accusing Ms. Mufti of fuelling “unnecessary confusion and political uncertainty,” the Congress asked the PDP and the BJP “to explain what transpired between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Ms. Mufti.”

“The PDP projected in public that no government formation was possible without the fulfilment of confidence-building measures and other conditions. People need to know whether it was a match fixing between the two parties,” said J&K Pradesh Congress Committee chief spokesperson Ravinder Sharma.

NC general secretary Ali Mohammad Sagar said: “Why this surrender after two-and-a half-months of tough posturing? The PDP should answer the people.”
title: Why this delay, ask Cong., NC
